actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize appropriations for certain cooperative projects among the United States, Israel, and developing countries, and for other purposes.
short_title: United States-Israel International Development Cooperation Act of 2023

summary.text:
United States-Israel International Development Cooperation Act of 2023

This bill increases and extends the authorization to finance cooperative projects among the United States, Israel, and developing counties that identify and support local solutions to sustainability challenges related to water resources, agriculture, and energy storage. The U.S. Agency for International Development shall report to Congress on the feasibility and advisability of expanding development projects to include multilateral cooperation among the United States, Israel, and regional Arab partners.

titles.title: United States-Israel International Development Cooperation Act of 2023
